Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (That bag looks too small for two passengers.)

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (Where are their parents? Letting their kids travel alone in times like these?)

Choices.Choice1: Ask if their parents come along
Choices.Choice2: Ask if they're on a short vacation

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: My guess is that you two are traveling alone.
Speaker.line2: Or did your parents come with you?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: Are you two on a short vacation?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: You two are quite brave for children your age.

Choices.Choice1: Are you going to see your parents?
Choices.Choice2: It must be challenging to travel alone

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Sad
Speaker.line1: I wish this was a real vacation...

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Sad
Speaker.line1: I've always wanted to travel with my entire family.

Choices.Choice1: Are you going to see your parents?
Choices.Choice2: It must be challenging to travel alone

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Are your parents waiting over at the Westside?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: It must be challenging to travel alone without adults.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: That sounds like a great time.

Speaker.name: Evelyn_Happy
Speaker.line1: And mother is going to get me a lot of pretty hats!

Choices.Choice2: Have a great time over there

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Happy
Speaker.line2: I can order anything I want without Mom complaining.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: You did take the opportunity, indeed.

Choices.Choice2: Have a great time over there

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Are you excited to stay with your mother?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I hope you two have a great time over there!

Speaker.name: Evelyn_Happy
Speaker.line2: I miss my mother a lot.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Normal
Speaker.line1: Both of us are very excited,

Speaker.name: Evelyn_Happy
Speaker.line2: I can't wait to see my mom.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Sad
Speaker.line1: We could really use your blessing,

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Sad
Speaker.line2: We can't be with both of our parents.

Choices.Choice1: Is that why you are moving to Westside?
Choices.Choice2: I'm so sorry to hear that

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: I'm so sorry to hear that.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: Is that why you're moving to Westside?

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Normal
Speaker.line1: Yes, we are going to live with our mother.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Sad
Speaker.line1: The %court% %verdict% came just before we got on this ride.
Speaker.line2: I thought father would change his mind...

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Sad
Speaker.line1: I wonder if we will ever see him again.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: There are plenty of opportunities in the future.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I believe he will always be with you,

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Normal
Speaker.line2: Could you sneak us some more snacks?

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Happy
Speaker.line1: It would make us feel a lot better!
